Items.name: Tutorial
Items.description:
Welcome to Arcane Guardian!
You will see several of the tutorial boxes when you first discover a new mechanic.
They can be dismissed by clicking the X in the top right corner.

You can reset the tutorial in the Settings, if you missed something. (Try pressing ESC after closing this tutorial window to open it!)

Items.name: Pause
Items.description:
Great!
As you can see the game is paused right now. You can pause the game by pressing ESC

Try unpausing the game by pressing ESC again after closing this window!

Items.name: Goal
Items.description:
It is your goal to protect the Source of Magi from invading forces. You are the last line of defense!

Enemies will spawn in waves and try to destroy the Source. If they succeed, you lose the game.

Items.name: Movement
Items.description:
I can run, I can walk! I can dance and swing!

Use WASD to move around and Right Mousebutton to swing your sword.

Dismiss this tutorial window by and try swinging your weapon!

Items.name: Crystal
Items.description:
Great job!

Maybe you noticed something following your character. This is the Source of Magi.
It needs power to function, but can only do so if you place it.

Try changing to the Building Mode by pressing B after closing this tutorial window!

Items.name: BuildingMode
Items.description:
This is the Building Mode.
Here you can place the Source of Magi (By pressing 1 on your Keyboard) and other buildings that help you protect the Source.

Every building costs Gold (Seen at the bottom right) which can be earned by defeating the invaders.

Buildings can only be placed (with the Left Mousebutton) on a flat surface, marking the building green, if on a valid tile.

Try placing the Source of Magi by pressing 1 after closing this tutorial window!

Items.name: MoreBuildingInfo
Items.description:
Well done!

Just as you placed the Source, you can place other buildings. They will help you protect the Source.

You can also rotate buildings by pressing R and calling the Source back to follow you with F.
BUT BEWARE!
Every building will be destroyed and you will only get a part of the Gold back!

Try changing back to the Normal Mode by pressing B after closing this tutorial window!

Items.name: Talents
Items.description:
As an Arcane Guardian you have powerful Skills to help you defend the Source.

Try opening the Talent Menu by pressing N after closing this tutorial window!

Items.name: TalentsOpen
Items.description:
Nice!

Here you can spend Talent Points to unlock new Skills or upgrade existing ones.
Hovering over one with the Mouse shows some helpful information!

You earn Talent Points to learn new Skills by defeating strong invaders!

Try unlocking a Skill by clicking it with the Left Mousebutton after closing this tutorial window!

Items.name: TalentLearned
Items.description:
Great!
br>You now have learned a new Skill!
As you learn new Skills, more powerful Skills will become available for you to learn!

"But how do I use such a Skill?" you say?

Try pressing K after closing this tutorial window!

Items.name: Skillbook
Items.description:
Here you can see your learned Skills.

Try dragging one with your Mouse while holding it with the Left Mousbutton to the Actionbar at the bottom of the screen!

Keep in mind that you can only assign Skills in Normal Mode. If you are still in Building Mode, press B!

Now close this tutorial window, your Skillbook (K or clicking on X) and your Talent Menu (L or clicking on X) and try using your new Skill by pressing the matching keyboard key of the Action in the Actionbar! (Bottom right of the Action!)

Items.name: SkillUsed
Items.description:
Fantastic!

Now you are ready to defend the Source! Before the first wave you have unlimited time to build and test your Skills. After that, you only have limited time to build, before the next wave starts.

After closing this window, you can start the waves of enemies by pressing Q!

If you want a wave to spawn faster after the first one, you can press Q again!

Items.name: TalentEarned
Items.description:
You have earned a new Talent Point!

They will drop from Bosses like the one you just defeated. Great job!
